item.title: I am fucking DDOSing their site.
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
henno13:

What. The. Fuck

This one’s iromic, considering that that poster’s user title is “Putting ‘stud’ back into Bible study”

EDIT: That’s one fucked up parody. If this truely is staged, they must have some serious willpower. Their mentality was so fucked up that I first thougt it to be genuine.

The basis of it all is “Poe’s Law.”

Read full topic
item.source: I am fucking DDOSing their site.

item.title: I am fucking DDOSing their site.
item.dc:creator: henno13
item.description:
With the hyper homosexuality of Counter Strike it is no surprised that young men wander the streets looking for women to shot. To a player of this game a woman must appear an alien creature she is so beyond their limited life experience. It the mad world of computer games “alien” means enemy and that means killing. As Christians we should all be outraged at this mindset.

What. The. Fuck

I have yet to meet a teenaged boy who is immersed in this depraved world of violent homoerotic video games that isn’t a queer himself. I have spent countless hours witnessing to these zit-faced losers over at the video arcades in Downtown Des Moines, and I can tell you they spend plenty of time on their knees. And not in prayer, either!

This one’s iromic, considering that that poster’s user title is “Putting ‘stud’ back into Bible study”

EDIT: That’s one fucked up parody. If this truely is staged, they must have some serious willpower. Their mentality was so fucked up that I first thougt it to be genuine.

Read full topic

item.title: I am fucking DDOSing their site.
item.dc:creator: Patonki
item.description:
(rot)(fodder:

So when it was Christians hating other people it was rage worthy, but when it is other people hating Christians it is good fun?

I actually like the premise, how blunt the execution may be. It’s trolling pseudo-intellectuals.

item.title: I am fucking DDOSing their site.
item.dc:creator: KMCA
item.description:
Honestly until I saw the link to the ‘disclaimer’ I thought it was real. I’ve worked religious events before. They loved me, I was polite, well spoken and non judgemental. They loved me until someone said
“It’s nice to see young people today still worship god and follow his laws” to which I replied
“Actually I’m Athiest, I just happen to be professional and a nice guy.” (they didn’t need to know how I am off duty) They didn’t like me very much after that. Hardcore Catholics are typically the worst in my opinion… perhaps extremist catholics would be a better way to put it

Read full topic
